text: Hong Da-bin (Hangul: 홍다빈; born January 1, 1993), better known by his stage name DPR Live (Hangul: 디피알 라이브), is a South Korean rapper and singer. DPR stands for "Dream Perfect Regime". He released his debut EP, Coming to You Live, on March 15, 2017. He then released his second EP, Her, on December 7, 2017. His first studio album, Is Anybody Out There?, was released on March 3, 2020. == Personal life == Hong Da-bin was born on January 1, 1993, South Korea and was raised in Guam. He planned to pursue his higher education in psychology and philosophy in college before considering music but his perspective changed after he attended his mandatory military service in South Korea, where "he found inspiration to go after his dream." He began writing during that period of time and continued to do so, which led him to grow "into a natural passion for music" ==Discography== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Album details ! scope="col" colspan="2" | Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Sales |- ! scope="col" style="width:2.5em;"| KOR ! scope="col" style="width:2.5em;"| US World |- ! scope="row" | Is Anybody Out There? | *Released: March 3, 2020 *Label: Dream Perfect Regime, Kakao M *Formats: CD, digital download | 5 || — | *KOR: 9,976 |} ===Extended plays=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Album details ! scope="col" colspan="2" | Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Sales |- ! scope="col" style="width:2.5em;"| KOR * * * ! scope="col" style="width:2.5em;"| US World * |- ! scope="row" | Coming To You Live | *Released: March 15, 2017 *Label: Dream Perfect Regime, Universal Music Korea *Formats: CD, digital download | 31 || 14 | *KOR: 880+ |- ! scope="row" | Her | *Released: December 7, 2017 *Label: Dream Perfect Regime, LOEN Entertainment *Formats: CD, digital download | 24 || 8 | *KOR: 2,721+ |- |} ===Singles=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Title ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Year ! scope="col" colspan="1" | Peak chart positions ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Sales (DL) ! scope="col" rowspan="2" | Album |- !
